snippet: A song by Sister Kathy Sherman, written in response to the Vatican’s rebuke of the main association of American nuns, has become an anthem for those who support them.
abstract: Song by Sister Kathy Sherman of the Sisters of St Joseph of La Grange in Illinois, written in response to the Vatican’s rebuke of the main association of American nuns, has become an anthem for those who support them.
lead_paragraph: A song by Sister Kathy Sherman, written in response to the Vatican’s rebuke of the main association of American nuns, has become an anthem for those who support them.

headline.seo: Nun Brings Music and Strong Message to Her Ministry
headline.main: Nun Uses Music to Convey Spirited Message Against the Vatican’s Rebuke
headline.print_headline: Nun Uses Music to Convey Spirited Message Against the Vatican’s Rebuke
